item.title: Tree chopped down on green lanes, 30th August

item.title: Rain build up huge puddle, 30th August
item.description:
Water fills completely when heavy rain. Car drove through and completely covered me on my way to work. I had to go home and get showered again. Problem been there for years, water needs to be able to drain away. The footpath is so close to the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tudor Way, Poverest, London

item.title: Tree Maintenance, 30th August
item.description:
I am writing to raise a concern regarding the tree located directly outside my property at 35/37 Thurlow Park Road, SE21 8JP. The tree has become quite overgrown, and its roots have lifted and damaged the pavement. Unfortunately, the roots have also started to affect the foundations of our house. We do not wish for the tree to be removed, but we would kindly request that it be assessed and trimmed back to prevent further overgrowth and potential damage. Could you please arrange for an inspection and advise on the next steps? Thank you for your assistance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thurlow Park Road, Tulse Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Health and Safety issue on 25 Remington Road N15 6SS, 30th August
item.description:
Since new buildings were built this resident has closed this pathway pedestrian pathway which is against the highway laws. Us residents want this pathway to be inspected this Side of the road is a communal area occupied by 25 Remington road n15 6ss which is planting trees bushes which is obstructing the view of the road as driver cannot see pedestrians walking towards them because of this garden. There should be no garden here according to the highway laws it is health and Saffet hazardous matter please help us

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corner between Shoot-Up Hill and either Kingscroft Road or St Cuthberts Road, 30th August
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shoot Up Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
